attributes.action: full detailed expenses of all eu mep
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Complete and fully detailed with NO Blacked out parts - we want All the expenses - wages - pensions etc for all the eu meps for the last ten years.  As we are the highest payers into this 'club' we have the right to see full accounts

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
